statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, preferred_category FROM loyalty_program WHERE preferred_category IN ('Electronics', 'Fashion');
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount, last_purchase_date, preferred_category FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_category FROM loyalty_program WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND preferred_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id), AVG(total_purchase_amount) FROM loyalty_program WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE preferred_category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories') ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM Customer ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 3;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM Customer ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_points) AS total_points FROM customers GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_points) > 500;
SELECT p.customer_id, c.name, p.purchase_date, p.total_amount FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY p.purchase_date ASC;
SELECT name, email, total_points FROM customers WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT name, category, preference_level FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE category = 'Books' ORDER BY name, preference_level DESC;

SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_points) AS avg_points FROM customers GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_points > 50 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT p.name, p.price FROM Products p INNER JOIN Preferences pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, p.price FROM Products p JOIN Purchases pur ON p.product_id = pur.total_amount WHERE pur.purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT c.name, pro.name FROM Customers c JOIN Preferences pref ON c.customer_id = pref.customer_id JOIN Products pro ON pref.product_id = pro.product_id WHERE pref.rating >= 4 ORDER BY pro.price DESC;

SELECT c.name, pr.name, pr.price FROM Customers c JOIN Preferences pref ON c.customer_id = pref.customer_id JOIN Products pr ON pref.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2 AND pref.rating > 3 ORDER BY pr.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT SUM(points) AS total_points FROM LoyaltyPoints;
SELECT name, total_amount FROM Products WHERE price >= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) FROM Preferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 2;

SELECT c.name as customer_name, p.name as product_name, pr.rating FROM Customers c JOIN Preferences pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id JOIN Products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pr.rating > 3 ORDER BY c.name ASC, pr.rating DESC;
